column4: Jordan-U; I've tried that once and it said it's a BAD idea; only if I used blocklists, and it said it's unreliable.
I was thinking of deleting the second system with Gparted and running "$ sudo update-grub" or something, to see what happens. But I'm really afraid it doesn't work and I will have broken system.
the worst thing that'll happen is you get to reinstall
